description:
Peta wants Null to attend school, but Null`s advanced intellect makes her stand out from her peers. Can the siblings come to terms over Null`s class attendance?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Sister, Do I Have to Go to School?
Grande sœur, je dois vraiment aller à l’école ?
أختي، هل أنا مضطرة للذهاب إلى المدرسة؟
お姉ちゃん学校行かなきゃダメ?
